title: Solr features based on Hadoop that do not work on Java9
description: This issue will serve as a central tracking point / "blocker" for Solr issues leveraging Hadoop code that does not work properly on java9.

comments.content: Hadoop's primary tracking issue related to java9 support is HADOOP-11123
comments.author: Hoss Man

comments.content: Linking SOLR-8052 & SOLR-10199 - two issues that are currently caused by hadoop+java9 problems (but we might be able to solve by removing the dependency on hadoop in those code paths)
comments.author: Hoss Man

comments.content:
Thanks Hoss for this Uber-Issue 

I know the HADOOP-11123 stuff, I was already involved in the sun.misc.Cleaner part (also known as MMapDirectory unmapping on our side..., see HADOOP-12760).
comments.author: Uwe Schindler

comments.content: FYI, Hadoop stopped fixing the incompatibilities of JDK 9/10 as they are EOL, and focuses on supporting JDK 8/11. Please see HADOOP-11123.
comments.author: Takanobu Asanuma
